The claim refers to Essex County residen: 2. The expert's verdict confirms that Essex County ranks second in terms of property taxes paid as a percentage of the median household income.
However: when considering two other measurements, Essex County does not rank as high. It ranks sixth in terms of median property tax bill and 92nd in terms of property taxes as a percentage of the median home value.
The data used to verify the claim was co: a Washington, DC-based group that studies tax policy, and represents five-year averages for the period between 2005 and 2009.
